Crisis in the Pallava Dynasty

The Chalukya king Vikramaditya II invaded Kanchi. Paramesvaravarman entered into a humiliating treaty, but was later killed in a counter-attack against the Ganga kings.

ğŸ“Œ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • End: With his death, the direct line of Simhavishnu came to an end.
  • Temple: Commenced the construction of the Vaikuntha Perumal Temple in Kanchi (later completed by Nandivarman).
